ERROR.NO_LEAGUES_DESC: We could not find any leagues for your account
ERROR.NO_CHARS_DESC: We could not find any characters for your account
ERROR.INIT_SESSION_FAIL_DESC: We could not initialize your session
ERROR.FETCH_PRICES_FAIL_DESC: Prices could not be fetched from one or more sources
ERROR.FETCH_ITEMS_FAIL_DESC: One or more items could not be fetched from your tabs
ERROR.FETCH_TABS_FAIL_DESC: One or more tabs could not be fetched
ERROR.PRICE_ITEMS_FAIL_DESC: One or more items could not be priced
ERROR.COOKIE_NOT_SET_DESC: An error occured when setting the cookie
ERROR.SESSION_NOT_VALID_DESC: The session could not be validated, please verify that your account and session id is correct

INFORMATION.COOKIE_SET_DESC: A cookie was created with your session id
INFORMATION.FETCH_TABS_SUCCESS_DESC: All stash tabs was correctly fetched
INFORMATION.FETCH_ITEMS_SUCCESS_DESC: All items in your stash tabs was correctly fetched
INFORMATION.NO_STORAGE_DESC: A local data storage could not be found, we will create one for you
INFORMATION.PRICE_ITEMS_SUCCESS_DESC: All items were successfully priced from chosen sources
INFORMATION.LOAD_FROM_STORAGE_SUCCESS_DESC: Data (settings, history etc) was correctly loaded from disc

SNAPSHOT.SNAPSHOT_STARTED_DESC: Started fetching net worth data for your stash tabs
SNAPSHOT.SNAPSHOT_FINISHED_DESC: New net worth data for your stash tabs was fetched successfully

SUCCESS.SESSION_VALID_DESC: Session was validated, your account credentials are correct
